title: More Machine Plates
content:
This plate is from a short bed planer we've had for at least thirty-three years:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420120430im_/http:/typophile.com/files/walker-turner_4097.jpg)

I've always loved this one from our shaper:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420120430im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hammer-shaper_5883.jpg)
  
I think we've had this one for thirty-five years.
author: mica
